game.name: Haru and Wonder Land
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Haru and Wonder Land is a game where Haru, a young cellist, embarks on an adventure in a mysterious world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Haru and Wonder Land is a game where Haru, a young cellist, embarks on an adventure in a mysterious world.
